rot13Encoder.hint: ROT13 is a simple letter substitution cipher that replaces each letter with the letter 13 positions after it in the alphabet. Since 13 is half of 26 letters, encoding and decoding use the same operation.

pigLatinConverter.rule2: Words starting with consonants: move consonants to end and add 'ay' (e.g., hello → ellohay)
